name: Tales of Logi
description:
Tales of Logi is a Fantasy text RPG where the player must acquire resources in order to conquer vast lands within the game. The player will be able to choose which paths they can take in order to shape their destiny. By collecting resources and conquering lands, the player will be able to unlock new and unique storyline that will allow them to dictate how the story ends.  Follow Logi on his quest to conquer the dark power within him. The actions that the player chooses will affect the player’s stamina, weapons, and gear. 

Tales of Logi is a text heavy Visual Novel with a major twist. During certain events the player can just choose what Logi does or the player can visualize the experience in a card based battle. In this way, choices aren't so easy when you have to defeat all the enemies yourself instead of just picking an option. However all card battles are optional so players who want to just experience the story can do that as well.

Will you as the player learn to control the power within or will lose yourself to chaotic corruption?
